Text:
Firstly, thanks. However, this is another file with a non-standard VBR audio stream of less than 128kbps, using "Writing Application: Lavf53.2.0", according to MediaInfo.
This audio will not play on some hardware media players, including PopCornHour.
It can be fixed by remuxing with AviDemux or similar apps, but continues to be a PITA.
To LOL encoders, only some of you are doing this. Could you please use other methods that don't cause this problem.
Thanks man, i really appreciate the courage to share with the rest of us.

thanks for the ul - not sure if i'm goin to have any audio issues given comment above, but i'll give it a crack and find out :-)
cheers ul'er!
